function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate social infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation due to lack of resources and support for public health measures","Mitigation":"Investment in social infrastructure, public health campaigns, and community support systems","Technologies":"Smart city technology for health monitoring, public health surveillance systems","People":"Residents, public health authorities, government","Owner":"Government, city planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited organization of residential units","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to crowded and poorly designed living spaces","Mitigation":"Improvement in housing design, implementation of ventilation systems, and efficient use of space","Technologies":"Smart home technology, ventilation systems, space optimization software","People":"Residents, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"},{"Description":"Inability to spend free time outdoors in smaller, controlled groups","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in confined spaces and limited outdoor access","Mitigation":"Promotion of outdoor public spaces, implementation of safe outdoor gathering areas, and community planning for open spaces","Technologies":"Digital mapping for outdoor spaces, urban design software, community engagement platforms","People":"Residents, community leaders, urban planners","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
